column2: an A.M. Eatery////Anytime I am in Colorado I plan a visit to Snooze.  The new Houston location would make the Denver original proud!  The service was outstanding (shout-out to our awesome server
column3: Victoria)! The food was was perfection
column4: and they have lots of yummy morning cocktails! You will likely have to wait for a table
column5: but I assure you it will be worth it! Snooze
column6: I think you need to start scouting your 2nd Houston location!!
